```{python}
from langchain_core.prompts import ChatPromptTemplate, load_prompt

# ChatPromptTemplate 생성
prompt = ChatPromptTemplate.from_messages(
    [
        ("system", "You are a helpful assistant"),
        ("user", "{country}의 수도는 어디인가요?"),
    ]
)
prompt
```
